short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The world's stupidest extension. Changes all instances of the letter R to the letter P.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever looked at web pages and thought "I really hate the letter R, I want it to be replaced with the letter P"? I know I have. That's why I created GLAPE, the world's stupidest extension. It changes R to P. It doesn't do anything on Google domains because that appears to break everything. Likely it will break other websites too! All in good fun, I say.

Pemembep: If you'pe not having tpouble peading it, you'pe not GLAPING hapd enough!
